description: This file defines and configures a reasoning agent using various tools and models, and executes a request to generate a comparison report between NVDA and TSLA.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent configured with a model, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model used for generating responses.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A class providing financial data tools such as stock prices, analyst recommendations, company info, and news.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: A method to output the agent's response, optionally streaming and showing full reasoning.
